group_1.textRight: Yes, all done! Victory! Now I can get back @to shopping!
[chara:302350:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thanks for the help! I'd never have finished@that quickly without you!
Oh, I'm Aimi Eri by the way! [chara:302350:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302350:cheek_0][chara:302350:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302350:lipSynch_1]Guess it was@fate we met, huh? Nice to meet ya!
Nice to meet you, Ren! [chara:302350:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302350:cheek_1][chara:302350:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302350:lipSynch_1]So if you're here...
You came to buy Valentine's chocolate too?
Am I wrong?
I knew it! It's that time of the year!
I'm sending some to my crush, too!
What's your crush like, Ren?
Oh, sorry! [chara:302350:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302350:cheek_0][chara:302350:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302350:lipSynch_1]I just blurted that right out,@didn't I?
I just looove talking romance, y'see...
Sorry...
You're gonna give chocolate to your friends?
Chocolate for your pals! That's so nice!@That's the spirit of Valentine's, right?
I'm gonna be giving everyone in my class@chocolate too, not just the guy I like!
Hey Ren, have you already decided what @kind you're gonna give?
Oooh, okay! [chara:302350:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302350:cheek_0][chara:302350:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302350:lipSynch_1]Wanna look around together?
I've decided to go homemade this time![chara:302350:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302350:cheek_0][chara:302350:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302350:lipSynch_1]@So, I got some ingredients for that...
But, y'know, on my first trip around I @couldn't decide what kind is best.
I think if I look around one more time,@I can figure something out.
It'd be fun to look through the different@brands and stuff with you, Ren!
How about it? If it's no trouble for you?
[chara:302350:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yaaay! Let's go, let's go!

group_1.textLeft: (We looked at everything, but...I still@don't know...)

group_1.textRight: That one chocolate was pretty... You know,@the one that was cut like a jewel?
And I could make that with mostly the @same ingredients...
That's it!
Who, me? [chara:302350:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302350:cheek_0][chara:302350:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302350:lipSynch_1]Yeah, I think so!
So I already told you mine are gonna be @homemade, right?
So I'm doing it myself...
I'll make round ones, four in a box. But@here's the twist...
I'll make just one of the chocolates a@different shape!
The different-colored ones we saw in the@store were sooo pretty, right?

group_1.textLeft: (Yeah, there was one that she looked@really interested in... A red heart shape.)

group_1.textRight: I think I'll just put one like that inside!
Ren, your turn! What caught your eye?
Oh, okay.
Hmm...
You just gotta think of what your friend@likes! ...Or that's what they say, but...
That's kinda hard, isn't it?
What else might work?
Oh! [chara:302350:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302350:cheek_0][chara:302350:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302350:lipSynch_1]I know! Something you felt happy@getting as a present!

group_1.narration: Right then, something popped into my mind.
